title: Sandwich chain Subway will be sold to fast-food investor Roark Capital
description: Roark Capital, a private equity firm, will be acquiring Subway, the sandwich chain, with the aim of expanding and improving its stores. The deal's terms were not disclosed, but Roark was reported to be offering around $9.6 billion. Subway plans to continue modernizing its restaurants and expanding internationally under Roark's ownership.
